biography: Lauri is a familiar face around Jyväs-Golf and a man of singular focus and determination. His dedication to the sport is admired by all who know him.

While Lauri has only graced the Hector Trophée stage on one occasion, his presence is always felt. Though he may not have clinched a Victor Trophy or a Hector Trophée victory yet, his competitive spirit is undeniable. He is currently considered to be retired from Hector Trophée events.
Whether Lauri will make a surprise return to the greens for the Hector Trophée 2025 remains to be seen, but one thing is certain: his passion for golf endures.
